Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html#/c:objc.name: -backgroundColorForState:
Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html#/c:objc.abstract: Returns the background color for specific states.

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: colorOverlayValid
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor that should be used when highlighting a valid scan

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: colorOverlayInvalid

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: colorOverlayFill
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor that should be used as fill for the MRZ scan overlays

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.name: scanBackgroundColor
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the UIColor for the background of the scan view

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: disableBlur
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Disable blurred background by setting this property to true.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: enableDarkMode
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Sets the blur style to dark theme which is applied before all other customization options. Light blur is used as standard.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: foregroundColor
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Sets the color of the foreground. If nil the standard color will be used.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customLightFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the font name of your light font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customRegularFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your regular font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customMediumFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your medium font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customBoldFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your bold font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customItalicFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your regular italic font used within the application.

Protocols/JumioAppearance.html.name: JumioAppearance
Protocols/JumioAppearance.html.abstract: Protocol that is used for all UI Objects to be customized via UIAppearance

Classes/JumioBaseView.html.name: JumioBaseView
Classes/JumioBaseView.html.abstract: Base class which is used to set our SDK via UIAppearance pattern

Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html.name: JumioScanOverlayView
Classes/JumioScanOverlayView.html.abstract: UIView that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used to tint our scan overlays.

Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html.name: JumioNegativeButton
Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html.abstract: UIButton that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used within our confirmation or error views and invokes a negative action (e.g. cancel, retry).

Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html.name: JumioPositiveButton
Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html.abstract: UIButton that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used within our confirmation or error views and invokes a positive action (e.g. readable, OK).

Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.name: JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView
Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.abstract: UIView that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used to define the uiimage that is - when set - drawn instead of the NavigationBar title.

Enums/JumioFaceRetryReason.html#/c:@E@Ju.name: JumioFaceRetryReasonIProovGeneric
Enums/JumioFaceRetryReason.html#/c:@E@Ju.abstract: iProov: A generic error occured for LA

Enums/JumioFaceRetryReason.html#/c:@E@Ju.name: JumioFaceRetryReasonIProovGPA
Enums/JumioFaceRetryReason.html#/c:@E@Ju.abstract: iProov: A generic error occured for GPA

Enums/JumioFaceRetryReason.html.name: JumioFaceRetryReason
Enums/JumioFaceRetryReason.html.abstract: The reason why a scan for a part has been unsuccessful

Classes/JumioDeviceInfo.html.name: JumioDeviceInfo
Classes/JumioDeviceInfo.html.abstract: NSObject that holds information about the device.

Enums/NetverifyWatchlistScreening.html#/.name: NetverifyWatchlistScreeningDefault
Enums/NetverifyWatchlistScreening.html#/.abstract: Standard setting, makes use of sever settings

Enums/NetverifyScanMode.html#/c:@E@Netve.name: NetverifyScanModeOCR_Template
Enums/NetverifyScanMode.html#/c:@E@Netve.abstract: Scan mode is OCR with automatic ID detection

Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html#/c:.name: NetverifyConfirmationTypeGeneric
Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html#/c:.abstract: Generic confirmation to check if everything is readable and glare free

Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html#/c:.name: NetverifyConfirmationTypeCheckDocumentSide
Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html#/c:.abstract: The user should confirm that the scanned side matches the requested one

Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html#/c:.name: NetverifyConfirmationTypeAnalyzing
Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html#/c:.abstract: Document is being analyzed, the user should not be able to confirm or retake

Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html#/c:.name: NetverifyConfirmationTypeAnalyzingResponsePass
Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html#/c:.abstract: Analysis passed document, the user should be able to confirm

Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html#/c:.name: NetverifyConfirmationTypeAnalyzingResponseReject
Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html#/c:.abstract: Analysis rejected document, the user should be able to retry

Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html.name: NetverifyConfirmationType
Enums/NetverifyConfirmationType.html.abstract: The type of confirmation that should be displayed

Enums/NetverifyDocumentType.html.name: NetverifyDocumentType
Enums/NetverifyDocumentType.html.abstract: Document Type used for preselection and extraction

Enums/NetverifyMRZFormat.html.name: NetverifyMRZFormat
Enums/NetverifyMRZFormat.html.abstract: Defines the format of the MRZ Code

Enums/NetverifyScanMode.html.name: NetverifyScanMode
Enums/NetverifyScanMode.html.abstract: Defines the scan mode that is used

Enums/NetverifyScanSide.html.name: NetverifyScanSide
Enums/NetverifyScanSide.html.abstract: Defines the part of the scan step

Enums/NetverifyWatchlistScreening.html.name: NetverifyWatchlistScreening
Enums/NetverifyWatchlistScreening.html.abstract: Defines if whatchlist screening is enabled or disabled

Protocols/NetverifyViewControllerDelegat.name: -netverifyViewController:didFinishInitializingWithError:
Protocols/NetverifyViewControllerDelegat.abstract: Called when the SDK and all resources are loaded. Error will be null in case of success.

Protocols/NetverifyViewControllerDelegat.name: -netverifyViewController:didFinishWithDocumentData:scanReference:accountId:authenticationResult:
Protocols/NetverifyViewControllerDelegat.abstract: Called when the SDK finished with success.

Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..name: -netverifyUIController:didFinishInitializingWithError:
Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..abstract: Called when the SDK and all resources are loaded. Error will be null in case of success. Always before netverifyUIController:didDetermineAvailableCountries:suggestedCountry:

Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..name: -netverifyUIController:shouldRequireUserConsentWithURL:
Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..abstract: This delegate is invoked when the end-user’s consent to Jumio’s privacy policy is legally required. Please call “userConsentGiven:” when the end-user has accepted.

Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..name: -netverifyUIController:didDetermineAvailableCountries:suggestedCountry:
Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..abstract: Called as soon as the SDK is set up and the required information is loaded and provides the available countries and document types. Only the valid NetverifyCountries and NetverifyDocuments which validate with the settings used in the NetverifyConfiguration will be provided here.

Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..name: -netverifyUIController:didDetermineNextScanViewController:isFallback:
Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..abstract: After setupWithDocument: is called on NetverifyUIController the scan view controller for the required scan side will be provided. While the order of the scan view controllers (Front, Back, Face) is predefined only the required ones will return in this method. The NetverifyCustomScanViewController should be presented and dismissed by the client application.

Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..name: -netverifyUIControllerDidCaptureAllParts:
Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..abstract: Called after all scan view controllers did finish scanning. Network tasks are still ongoing. We advice to show a loading animation. In case a nework error occurs further action is required (retry or cancel) in netverifyUIController:didDetermineError:retryPossible:

Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..name: -netverifyUIController:didDetermineError:retryPossible:
Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..abstract: Called whenever an error (due to network, ressources, permissions, …) occured. Please find more information about this in our gihub implementation guide at https://github.com/Jumio/mobile-sdk-ios/blob/master/docs/integration_netverify-fastfill.md#error .

Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..name: -netverifyUIController:didFinishWithDocumentData:scanReference:accountId:authenticationResult:
Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..abstract: Called when the SDK finished with success.

Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.name: -netverifyCustomScanViewController:shouldDisplayLegalAdvice:completion:
Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.abstract: During the scanning of some ID cards, a legal advice need to be shown.

Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.name: -netverifyCustomScanViewController:shouldDisplayConfirmationWithImageView:type:text:confirmation:retake:
Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.abstract: For some scan views we advice to show a confirmationView after scanning. In this case this delegate method will be called providing the final image.

Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.name: -netverifyCustomScanViewController:shouldDisplayNoUSAddressFoundHint:confirmation:
Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.abstract: No US Address has been found in the barcode. The scan preview will switch to frontside scanning if available. Check for the changed scan mode and help text. Will only be called on a Fastfill scan.

Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.name: -netverifyCustomScanViewControllerStartedBiometricAnalysis:
Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.abstract: Show a activity/loading animation to the user until biometric analysis is finished (usually a few seconds).

Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.name: -netverifyCustomScanViewController:shouldDisplayHelpWithText:animationView:forReason:
Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.abstract: For scan views we advice to show a help view with the provided animation and message.

Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.name: -netverifyCustomScanViewController:shouldDisplayBlurHint:
Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.abstract: Notify the user that the image is blurry and therefore can’t be taken. (Manual image capturing only)

Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.name: -netverifyCustomScanViewControllerWillPrepareIProovController:
Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.abstract: Show a activity/loading animation to the user while preparing iProov controller (usually a few seconds).

Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.name: -netverifyCustomScanViewControllerWillPresentIProovController:
Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.abstract: Hide the activity/loading animation as iProov is ready to be presented.

Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.name: NetverifyCustomScanViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/NetverifyCustomScanViewControl.abstract: Protocol that has to be implemented when using a NetverifyCustomScanViewController

Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..name: NetverifyUIControllerDelegate
Protocols/NetverifyUIControllerDelegate..abstract: Protocol that has to be implemented when using NetverifyUIControllerDelegate.

Protocols/NetverifyViewControllerDelegat.name: NetverifyViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/NetverifyViewControllerDelegat.abstract: Protocol that has to be implemented when using NetverifyViewController

Netverify%20Appearance.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: NetverifyBaseView

Netverify%20Appearance.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: NetverifyPositiveButton
Netverify%20Appearance.html#/c:objc(cs)N.abstract: UIButton that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used within our confirmation or error views and invokes a positive action (e.g. readable, OK).

Netverify%20Appearance.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: NetverifyScanOverlayView
Netverify%20Appearance.html#/c:objc(cs)N.abstract: UIView that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used to tint our scan overlays.

Classes/NetverifyViewController.html#/c:.name: -initWithConfiguration:
Classes/NetverifyViewController.html#/c:.abstract: Create an instance of the Netverify SDK.

Classes/NetverifyViewController.html#/c:.name: -destroy
Classes/NetverifyViewController.html#/c:.abstract: Call this method to destroy the NetverifyViewController instance, before you set it to nil.

Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.name: -initWithConfiguration:
Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.abstract: Create an instance of the Netverify SDK.

Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.name: -setupWithDocument:
Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.abstract: Use this method to setup the NetverifyUIController correctly before any scan view controller will be provided.

Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.name: -userConsentGiven:
Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.abstract: Use this method when user consent is given.

Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.name: -cancel
Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.abstract: Call the cancel method anytime in the workflow to abort the netverifyUIController process.

Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.name: -retryAfterError
Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.abstract: Call this method in case an error was received in netverifyUIController:didDetermineError:retryPossible:

Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.name: -destroy
Classes/NetverifyUIController.html#/c:ob.abstract: Call this method to destroy the NetverifyUIController instance, before you set it to nil

Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -idNumberValid
Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Method to retrieve information if ID number check digit is valid

Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -dobValid
Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Method to retrieve information if date of birth check digit is valid

Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -expiryDateValid
Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Method to retrieve information if expiry date check digit is valid

Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -personalNumberValid
Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Method to retrieve information if personal number check digit is valid

Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -compositeValid
Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Method to retrieve information if compositer check digit is valid

Classes/NetverifyError.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: code
Classes/NetverifyError.html#/c:objc(cs)N.abstract: A 6-digit alpha-numeric code. The first letter (A-Z) represents the error case. The remaining characters are represented by numbers that contain information helping us understand the problem situation.

Classes/NetverifyError.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: message
Classes/NetverifyError.html#/c:objc(cs)N.abstract: The human readable localized description. Localization can be adapted in our Localizable-Netverify.strings and it’s translations.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: selectedCountry
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code as provided or selected during the scanning process.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: selectedDocumentType
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Enum that defines the selected document type during the scanning process. Can be Passport, DriverLicense, IdentityCard and Visa

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: idNumber
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Identification number of the document

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: personalNumber
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Personal number of the document

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: issuingDate
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Date of issue of the document that was extracted during scanning

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: expiryDate
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Date of expiry of the document that was extracted during scanning

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: issuingCountry
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code of the issuing country of the document that was extracted during scanning.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: optionalData1
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Optional field of MRZ line 1

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: optionalData2
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Optional field of MRZ line 2

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: lastName
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Last name extracted from the document.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: firstName
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: First name extracted from the document.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: rawBarcodeFirstName
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Raw first name value extracted from documents with barcode.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: dob
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Date of birth extracted from the document.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: gender
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Enum of gender extracted from the document. Gender M, F, or X

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: originatingCountry
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code of origin.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: addressLine
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Street name extracted from the document.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: city
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: City extracted from the document.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: subdivision
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Last three characters of ISO 3166-2:US or ISO 3166-2:CA subdivision code

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: postCode
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Postal code extracted from the document.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: placeOfBirth
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Place of birth extracted from the document. Only available after NFC scan.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: extractionMethod
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Extraction method used during scanning (MRZ, OCR, BARCODE, BARCODE_OCR or NONE)

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: mrzData
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Object further describing information about the MRZ Code extracted from the document.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: frontImage
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Returns the raw image data within an UIImage for front in case this feature is enabled serverside.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: backImage
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Returns the raw image data within an UIImage for back in case this feature is enabled serverside.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.name: faceImage
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Returns the raw image data within an UIImage for face in case this feature is enabled serverside.

Classes/NetverifyDocument.html#/c:objc(c.name: selectedVariant
Classes/NetverifyDocument.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: A NetverifyDocument can have two variants. Set the selectedVariant to the one you’d like to use for scanning. Via supportsPaperVariant you can check if paperVariant is available for this document. Default: NetverifyDocumentVariantPlastic

Classes/NetverifyDocument.html#/c:objc(c.name: -supportsPaperVariant
Classes/NetverifyDocument.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: @returns if this document can scan a paper like document.

Classes/NetverifyDocument.html#/c:objc(c.name: -supportsPlasticVariant
Classes/NetverifyDocument.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: @returns if this document can scan a plastic document.

Classes/NetverifyDocument.html#/c:objc(c.name: -hasMultipleVariants
Classes/NetverifyDocument.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: @returns if this document has more than one variant.

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: customScanViewControllerDelegate
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Delegate class which implements the NetverifyCustomScanViewControllerDelegate protocol

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: customOverlayLayer
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: UIView which should be used to add any additional custom views as a subview

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -isFallbackAvailable
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: This method can not be called if scanning is paused or stopped

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -switchToFallback
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Switch to the alternative scan method

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -hasFlash
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: This method can not be called if scanning is paused or stopped

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -hasMultipleCameras
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: This method can not be called if scanning is paused or stopped

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -isFlashOn
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: This method can not be called if scanning is paused or stopped

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -currentCameraPosition
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: This method can not be called if scanning is paused or stopped

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -isImagePicker
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Determines whether the Scan View is a manual image picker

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -takeImage
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Target action for the shutter button in case the Scan View is a manual image picker

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -toggleFlash
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Toggles the built-in flash.

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -canSwitchCamera
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Determines whether the primary camera position can be switched

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -switchCamera
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Switches between available cameraPositions.

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -retryScan
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Call this method if you want to restart the capturing process.

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -pauseScan
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Call this method if you want to pause the capturing process. Camera preview will not be paused.

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -localizedShortHelpText
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Method to get the suggested help text

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: -localizedLongHelpText
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Method to get the suggested help text in long version

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: verticalRoiOffset
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Sets the vertical offset of the overlay (MRZ, OCR_Card) from the center.

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: brandingLogoTopMargin
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: Sets the top margin of the Jumio logo and Privacy Policy.

Classes/NetverifyCountry.html#/c:objc(cs.name: name
Classes/NetverifyCountry.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: The localized country name according to the locale of the device.

Classes/NetverifyCountry.html#/c:objc(cs.name: documents
Classes/NetverifyCountry.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Array contains NetverifyDocument ojects. Use this to display the available documents for this country.

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: apiToken
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: The API token of your Jumio merchant account

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: apiSecret
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: The corresponding API secret

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: authorizationToken
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: One-time session authorization token to initialize the SDK instead of apiToken and apiSecret.

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: customerInternalReference
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Identify the scan in the Jumio merchant UI. (Maximum characters: 100)

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: reportingCriteria
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Identify the scan in your reports. Set it to nil if you don’t use it. (Maximum characters: 100)

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: dataCenter
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Specifiy the DataCenter that should be used

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: offlineToken
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Set this token to use the SDK offline

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: delegate
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: A delegate implementing the NetverifyViewControllerDelegate protocol

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: customUIDelegate
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: A delegate implementing the NetverifyUIControllerDelegate protocol. Only use this when using Custom UI.

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: preselectedCountry
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Specify a country to skip selection by the user (format: ISO 3166-1 Alpha 3 code)

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: preselectedDocumentTypes
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Preselect selection to one or more documentTypes to restrict or skip selection by the user

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: preselectedDocumentVariant
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Specify a document variant to skip selection by the user

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: enableIdentityVerification
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Enable a face match check between a camera still image and the document front side (default: YES)

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: enableVerification
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Enable verification of a scanned identity (default: YES)

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: userReference
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Specifies how the user is registered on your system. For example, you can use an email address, user name, or account number. Optional. (Maximum characters: 100)

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: watchlistScreening
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Set watchlist screening on transaction level. Enable to override the default search, or disable watchlist screening for this transaction.

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: watchlistSearchProfile
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Search profile for watchlist screening. Optional.

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: cameraPosition
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Set the default camera position

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: callbackUrl
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Callback URL (max. 255 characters) for the confirmation after the verification is completed.

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: dataExtractionOnMobileOnly
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Use the following method to only support IDs where data can be extracted on mobile only

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: sendDebugInfoToJumio
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Use the following method to explicitly send debug-info to Jumio. (default: NO)

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: statusBarStyle
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Configure the status bar style for the duration NetverifyViewController is presented

Classes/ISOCountryConverter.html#/c:objc.name: +convertToAlpha2:
Classes/ISOCountryConverter.html#/c:objc.abstract: Use the following method to convert ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 into alpha-2 country code

Classes/ISOCountryConverter.html#/c:objc.name: +convertToAlpha3:
Classes/ISOCountryConverter.html#/c:objc.abstract: Use the following method to convert ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 into alpha-3 country code

Classes/ISOCountryConverter.html.name: ISOCountryConverter
Classes/ISOCountryConverter.html.abstract: ISOCountryConverter should be used to convert ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 into alpha-2 country codes and vice versa.

Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html.name: NetverifyConfiguration
Classes/NetverifyConfiguration.html.abstract: Netverify Settings class that is used to configure all available functional settings of NetverifyViewController or NetverifyUIController.

Classes/NetverifyConfirmationImageView.h.name: NetverifyConfirmationImageView
Classes/NetverifyConfirmationImageView.h.abstract: UIView that draws the image taken in NetverifyCustomScanViewController. This view will be provided via the netverifyCustomScanViewController:shouldDisplayConfirmationWithImageView:text:confirmation:retake: delegate method after a successful scan was performed. Simply add this view as subview and it will draw itself accordingly. We suggest to ask the user if the image is readable and properly alligned to prevent bad quality images.

Classes/NetverifyCountry.html.name: NetverifyCountry
Classes/NetverifyCountry.html.abstract: NSObject that holds the country information and the available NetverifyDocuments for this country. It will only contain the countries with at least one available document. If a country is preselected in NetverifyConfiguration only one NetverifyCountry will be returned via netverifyUIController:didDetermineAvailableCountries:suggestedCountry:.

Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.name: NetverifyCustomScanViewController
Classes/NetverifyCustomScanViewControlle.abstract: View Controller that handles scanning. It can display and handle different scanning methods.

Classes/NetverifyDocument.html.name: NetverifyDocument
Classes/NetverifyDocument.html.abstract: NSObject that holds the specific information about a document.

Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html.name: NetverifyDocumentData
Classes/NetverifyDocumentData.html.abstract: Result object that is returned in case of a successful scan that holds information that was extracted during scanning.

Classes/NetverifyError.html.name: NetverifyError
Classes/NetverifyError.html.abstract: Model class that describes an error situation with a code and a message. Please always include the whole code when filing an error related issue to our support team. Please find more information in our Mobile SDK Github Guides at https://github.com/Jumio/mobile-sdk-ios/blob/master/docs/integration_netverify-fastfill.md#error .

Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html.name: NetverifyMrzData
Classes/NetverifyMrzData.html.abstract: Result object that is returned in case of a successful scan within NetverifyDocumentData that holds more detailed information about the MRZ document.

Classes/NetverifyUIController.html.name: NetverifyUIController
Classes/NetverifyUIController.html.abstract: Main controller that defines the workflow of Fastfill and Netverify.

Classes/NetverifyViewController.html.name: NetverifyViewController
Classes/NetverifyViewController.html.abstract: Handles setup and presentation of the Netverify Mobile SDK.
